damage_kinetic.title: FR:Kinetic Damage
damage_kinetic.body: FR:Kinetic damage is great against shields, but poor against armor.

damage_highexplosive.title: FR:High Explosive Damage
damage_highexplosive.body: FR:High explosive damage is great against armor, but poor against shields.

damage_fragmentation.title: FR:Fragmentation Damage
damage_fragmentation.body:
FR:Fragmentation damage is very poor against both armor and shields. However, weapons dealing fragmentation damage usually have a very high DPS, making them devastating vs lightly-armored, unshielded targets such as light fighters and missiles.

It can also be highly effective against a ship whose armor is stripped away by battle damage.

damage_energy.title: FR:Energy Damage
damage_energy.body: FR:Energy damage is equally effective against shields and armor.

damage_other.title: FR:Other Damage
damage_other.body: FR:This weapon is special. In reality, though, if you're seeing this, it's probably a bug.

warroom.combatTime:
FR:Time elapsed with both fleets in contact with each other.

The peak performance time of reinforcements is reduced by half of the combat time.

tooltipCaptain.title: FR:Assign Captain
tooltipCaptain.body: FR:Assign a captain (yourself or an officer) to this ship. The ship will benefit from the captain's skills.

tooltipAdmin.title: FR:Assign Administrator
tooltipAdmin.body: FR:Assign an administrator (or yourself) to govern this colony, which will then benefit from the assigned administrator's skills.

tooltipAdminNonPlayer.title: FR:Administrator
tooltipAdminNonPlayer.body: FR:This colony is not governed by an administrator of any note.

tooltipGive.title: FR:Store
tooltipGive.body: FR:Transfer this %s from your fleet. Its combat readiness will remain unchanged while it's in storage.

tooltipMothball.title: FR:Mothball
tooltipMothball.body:
FR:Mothballed %ss can't be used in combat or repaired, and do not provide any fuel, cargo, or personnel capacity.

Mothballing a ship will reduce its combat readiness to zero; restoring it will require time and supplies.

tooltipUnmothball.title: FR:Mothball
tooltipUnmothball.body:
FR:Mothballed %ss can't be used in combat or repaired, and do not provide any fuel, cargo, or personnel capacity.

Restoring this ship's combat readiness after unmothballing it will consume %s supplies over %s day(s).

tooltipScuttle.title: FR:Scuttle
tooltipScuttle.body: FR:Strip this %s of anything useful, gaining %d supplies, %d fuel, and %d heavy machinery.

tooltipSuspendRepairs.title: FR:Suspend Repairs & Recovery
tooltipSuspendRepairs.body: FR:Prevents this %s from performing repairs or recovering combat readiness. Full repairs and CR recovery will consume approximately %s supplies over %s days if allowed to proceed.

tooltipSuspendRepairsNotNeeded.title: FR:Suspend Repairs & Recovery
tooltipSuspendRepairsNotNeeded.body: FR:Prevents this %s from performing repairs or recovering combat readiness. This %s does not currently require repairs or CR recovery.

tooltipRefit.title: FR:Refit
tooltipRefit.body: FR:Change the weapons and hullmods equipped on this ship.

tooltipLogisticalPriority.title: FR:Logistical Priority
tooltipLogisticalPriority.body: FR:%ss with logistical priority get first pick of crew and supplies available for repairs.

tooltipCrewElite.title: FR:Elite
tooltipCrewElite.body: FR:Crew this %s with the best personnel available.

tooltipCrewVeteran.title: FR:Veteran
tooltipCrewVeteran.body: FR:Crew this %s with only veteran crew and below, if possible.

tooltipCrewRegular.title: FR:Regular
tooltipCrewRegular.body: FR:Crew this %s with only regular crew and below, if possible.

tooltipCrewGreen.title: FR:Green
tooltipCrewGreen.body: FR:Crew this %s only with green crew, if possible.

logistics.marines: FR:Number of marines in the fleet.
logistics.crew: FR:Number of crew in the fleet, and the number needed to meet the minimum requirements on all ships in the fleet.
logistics.supplies: FR:Available supplies and supply use per day.

misc.jumpPointNormal: FR:Jump points can be used to transit between hyperspace and normal space. Some jump points also lead to other destinations.
misc.jumpPointStar: FR:The gravity well of a star is deep enough to provide a one-way exit from hyperspace. Using one is, however, extremely difficult and dangerous.
misc.jumpPointGasGiant: FR:The gravity well of a gas giant is often deep enough to provide a one-way exit from hyperspace.
